Name: the Chainelane Isles
Description: The Chainelane Isles are a region in the deep periphery coreward of the Greater Valkyrate. The Isles are not a unified realm but rather a collection of warring planet-states and minor principalities fighting with mostly pre-Mech technology.
ReputationStatements: You have already crushed our armed forces beneath the feet of your 'Mechs. Please, if you want credits, we are quite capable of paying for you to fight for us!
We are unable to compete against your mighty 'Mechs. Please take on this contract and spare us further damage!
Commander, you have proven we are no match for your 'Mechs. Please help us to regain power in this area by taking up this task for us, and we will pay you well.
Commander, I hear you have 'Mechs in your DropShip? If so, we would like to contract you to undertake a task for us, one we will both find profitable.
Commander, you have assisted us in the past, and I hope that we can come to an arrangement regarding another task we would like you to perform.
Hello again, Commander. Your 'Mechs are a force to be reckoned with. We would like to contract you to perform another task for us.
Greetings, my dear friend. You and your 'Mechs have aided us so often in the pastâ€”when this highly profitable contract came up, I saved it just for you.
MissionSuccessStatements: Thank you, Commander. You have crushed the enemy with your mighty 'Mechs. Payment for your help has already been transferred to your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Commander, we expected more from you, seeing as you had a full lance of 'Mechs. However, you did complete some of the tasks required, so I have transferred a partial payment.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Seriously, Commander, my armies perform tasks like this all the time, with nothing but tanks and infantry, and you and your 'Mechs failed! You must not have tried, and I won't pay you anything!
